alert.note: Alert for Accomack; Charles City; City of Williamsburg; Essex; Gloucester; James City; King William; King and Queen; Lancaster; Mathews; Middlesex; New Kent; Northumberland; Richmond; Westmoreland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 02 at 7:06PM EDT until June 02 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 303 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 9 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN MARYLAND THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST MARYLAND DORCHESTER SOMERSET WICOMICO WORCESTER IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 15 COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL VIRGINIA CHARLES CITY ESSEX KING WILLIAM KING AND QUEEN NEW KENT RICHMOND WESTMORELAND IN EASTERN VIRGINIA LANCASTER MATHEWS MIDDLESEX NORTHUMBERLAND IN SOUTHEAST VIRGINIA ACCOMACK CITY OF WILLIAMSBURG GLOUCESTER JAMES CITY THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF BARNETTS, BAVON, BOTTOMS BRIDGE, BRAYS FORK, BROWNS CORNER, BUSCH GARDENS, CAMBRIDGE, CARET, CENTER CROSS, CENTERVILLE, CHAMPLAIN, CHINCOTEAGUE, CHRISTENSONS CORNER, CLANCIE, COLONIAL BEACH, CRISFIELD, CROAKER, DRAGONVILLE, DUNBROOKE, DUNNSVILLE, EWELL, FIVE FORKS, GLOUCESTER POINT, GREENBACKVILLE, GRESSIT, GROVE, HORNTOWN, HOWERTONS, KILMARNOCK, KING AND QUEEN COURT HOUSE, LANCASTER, LEWISETTA, LITTLE PLYMOUTH, MASCOT, MATTAPONI, MOUNTCASTLE, NEW CHURCH, NEW KENT AIRPORT, NEW POINT, NEW POINT COMFORT, OCEAN CITY, ONANCOCK, ORAPAX FARMS, PEARY, PRINCESS ANNE, QUINTON, ROXBURY, SALISBURY, TALLEYSVILLE, URBANNA, WARSAW, WAYSIDE, WEST POINT, AND WILLIAMSBURG.
